thread.title: WhatsApp feature: Soon users can upload photos, video clips as status | Zee News
thread.title_full: WhatsApp feature: Soon users can upload photos, video clips as status | Zee News

title: WhatsApp feature: Soon users can upload photos, video clips as status | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: In the latest, WhatsApp is once again coming up with new status update feature. 
Using this feature, that will be seen in the beta version for now, users will be able to upload photos and videos. 
The update will be available only for time period of 24 hours. 
Instagram or Snapchat already allow users to make use of this feature known as Stories. First Published: Wednesday, February 15, 2017 - 09:21 More from zeenews
